snippet.title: Bloodborne Kart: The Good Hunter Joins the Race!
snippet.description:
The hunter never got a proper intro teaser, so here is a formal announcement, alongside their hunter's kart, made by Corwyn Prichard!

Also introducing kart tricks! Press the drift button while in the air (or drift off a boost pad) to perform a trick. If the player is still in the air when the trick is complete (signified by the wheels gleaming), then they will get a free boost on landing!

Music by TheNobleDemon: https://youtu.be/1hs9-8RlSZA
Support my work on Patreon: http://patreon.com/lwmedia
Follow me on twitter for daily updates: https://twitter.com/b0tster
